mapper.select: select * from ( select * from dailyboard where num > #{num} order by adddate ) where rownum = 1
select * from ( select * from dailyboard where num<#{num} order by num desc ) where rownum=1
select NVL(count(*), 0) cnt from dailyboard where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from dailyboard where num=#{num} and id=#{id}
